ygData.subject: Re: The Ark Goes, We All Go
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine listens carefully about the ark, the plans were to either rebuild or repair, either job could prove impossible. One question Striker, where are we

Lunarpine listens carefully about the ark, the plans were to either 
rebuild or repair, either job could prove impossible.

"One question Striker, where are we supposed to get the equipment for 
another ship of die cast construction? We don't have a Crucible large 
enough for those quantities of metal."

He looked at Shadow Wing as she entered the room, "Hey wing, come to 
add some more intelect to the meeting?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker looks from Ratchet to Spears to Lunarpine. He nods at 
Lunarpine as a 
> way of greeting, looking down at the device Spears had given him. 
He presses 
> a button, a hologram of the Ark appearing.
> 
> Striker looks at Tranquility. "I think I'm in charge at the 
moment," he says, 
> turning to the others.
> 
> "Allright, we need to build a complete replica of the Ark," he 
pauses as 
> another panel falls from the cealing, "This one is dying. Blue 
Stinger hid 
> the Autobots somewhere a long time ago, so a planetary scan will be 
needed to 
> find them. We can use the pieces from the Keepers' ships, and spare 
parts 
> from other wrecks to build it."
